channel.title: Help Make SCAR Better!
channel.description:
To make SCAR more advanced, I will need your help. What you need to do is take screenshots of timed randoms (i,e; Exploding Rocks, Whirlpool, Certers, Poison Gas). When you have randoms that take you places (i,e; Freaky Forester, ScapeRune, BeeKepper, Molly, Pinball, Prision Pete) [u]Log out immediatly and post on here, private message me on here, or send me an email at[/u] Penguinbuddies@hotmail.com. I'll need to get onto your account to gather information. We will use a MM so you know I won't scam you. The MM will be a Mod or Admin, which ever is not busy. I will give the MM the same amount of gp to how much ammount of cash you have total.
Much Appreciated! :)
[u]Don't Worry about randoms that aren't on the list, trying to make the most common ones avoidable.[/u]
[u][b]Randoms Needed:[/b][/u] [i]Certers Freaky Forester Genie Jekyll and Hyde Lost Pirate Quiz Master Security Guard Evil Chicken Exploding Rock Poison Gas ScapeRune BeeKeeper Molly PinBall GraveDigger CandleLight Jail Prison Pete Sandwich Lady Lost Heads Spade Breaking- Farming[/i]

item.title: Help Make SCAR Better!
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Which of those can’t we already solve? Anti-randoms are built into srl. The only ones we can’t do I think are the maze and 1 other thing, i forgot though.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Make SCAR Better!
item.dc:creator: @Heroic Heroic
item.description:
@Heroic wrote:

To make SCAR more advanced, I will need your help. What you need to do is take screenshots of timed randoms (i,e; Exploding Rocks, Whirlpool, Certers, Poison Gas). When you have randoms that take you places (i,e; Freaky Forester, ScapeRune, BeeKepper, Molly, Pinball, Prision Pete) Log out immediatly and post on here, private message me on here, or send me an email at Penguinbuddies@hotmail.com. I’ll need to get onto your account to gather information. We will use a MM so you know I won’t scam you. The MM will be a Mod or Admin, which ever is not busy. I will give the MM the same amount of gp to how much ammount of cash you have total.

Much Appreciated!

Don’t Worry about randoms that aren’t on the list, trying to make the most common ones avoidable.

Randoms Needed:

Freaky Forester
